# mpv Media Player

This directory contains header files and documentation from the mpv media player project.

## Source

- **Project**: mpv media player
- **Repository**: https://github.com/mpv-player/mpv
- **Website**: https://mpv.io

## License

mpv is licensed under GNU General Public License (GPL) version 2 or later by default, with the option to build the library (libmpv) under the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) version 2.1 or later.

See the following license files in this directory:
- `LICENSE.GPL` - GNU General Public License v2
- `LICENSE.LGPL` - GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1
- `Copyright` - Detailed copyright and licensing information

## Contents

### Headers (`include/`)
- `client.h` - libmpv client API header file

### Documentation (`docs/`)
- `input.rst` - Command documentation (including loadfile and other commands)
- `lua.rst` - Lua scripting documentation

## Usage

These files are provided for reference and development purposes. When using mpv or libmpv in your project, ensure compliance with the applicable license terms (GPL v2+ or LGPL v2.1+).

## Attribution

mpv is a fork of mplayer2, which is a fork of MPlayer.

Copyright information and full list of contributors can be found in the `Copyright` file and in the mpv repository's git history.

## Additional Resources

- Official Documentation: https://mpv.io/manual/stable/
- GitHub Issues: https://github.com/mpv-player/mpv/issues
- Wiki: https://github.com/mpv-player/mpv/wiki
